org.kramerlab.vines

Class AbstractCopula

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kramerlab.vines.AbstractCopula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copula
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClaytonCopula, FrankCopula, GaussCopula, GumbelCopula, TCopula

    public abstract class AbstractCopula
extends java.lang.Object
implements Copula
    This is the abstract class to represent copula families for RVines. It implements the parameter handling for copulae.
    Author:
    Christian Lamberty (clamber@students.uni-mainz.de)
